description:
Naruto continues training under Jiraiya to master the "Summoning Jutsu" which enables him to call forth various living beasts. But he has a hard time controlling the Chakra of the Nine-Tailed Fox...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Feeling of Yearning, A Flower Full of Hope
Jede Menge Kaulquappen, nur kein Frosch
Setsunai Omoi, Negai o Kometa Ichirin
Un vœu fait à une fleur
ดอกไม้แห่งความหวัง
切ない想い 願いを込めた一輪
